gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 128, Hawks 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Hawks, 128-105 on their way to improving to 10-8 on the year and 3-1 in East A play. Donovan Mitchell led Cleveland with 40 points, 11 rebounds, and five assists as Evan Mobley totaled 17 points and 19 rebounds. Bogdan Bogdanovic and DeAndre Hunter had 18 points apiece for Atlanta. Atlanta moves to 8-9 on the year and 1-3 in East A play.
